item.title: Battlefield 6 gameplay changes post-beta
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/battlefield6_changes_following_the_beta/ -

Battlefield 6 just concluded it’s last beta session last weekend until full release on October 10th, 2025. Here are some of the changes coming on release. Visit the link below for the full list of changes.

  • M87A1 shotgun will now require more pellets to secure a kill.
  • Momentum, especially horizontal speed, carried from a slide into a jump has been reduced.
  • There is now a greater pentaly for consecutive jumps.

Read the full update here

- http://localhost:1313/posts/battlefield6_changes_following_the_beta/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: Bungie CEO is stepping down
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/bungie_ceo_is_stepping_down/ -

Pete began working at Bungie in 2003, when it was still part of Microsoft. He became CEO in 2016 and has held the role until now. Justin Truman, who started at the company in 2010 and worked as a General Manager on Destiny 2, has been appointed as the new Studio Head.

- http://localhost:1313/posts/bungie_ceo_is_stepping_down/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: High On Life 2 gets a February release date
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/high_on_life_gets_a_february_release_date/ -

Squanch Games also released 42 minutes of gameplay. High On Life 2 is set to release on,

  • Windows
  • Xbox Series X/S (Game Pass included)
  • PlayStation 5
- http://localhost:1313/posts/high_on_life_gets_a_february_release_date/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong release date revealed
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/hollow_knight_silksong_release_date_revealed/ -

Silksong is set to release on

  • Linux
  • MacOS
  • Windows
  • Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S (Game Pass included)
  • Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2
  • PlayStation 4 and 5
- http://localhost:1313/posts/hollow_knight_silksong_release_date_revealed/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: Xbox Game Pass August wave 2 revealed
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/gamepass_august2025_wave2/ -

August 19

  • Blacksmith Master (Game Preview) — Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass (Xbox on PC)
  • Void/Breaker — Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass (Xbox on PC)

August 20

  • Goat Simulator Remastered — Game Pass Standard (Xbox Series X|S)
  • Persona 4 Golden — Game Pass Ultimate, Standard, PC Game Pass (Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Xbox on PC)

August 21

  • Herdling — Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass (Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC)

August 26

  • Gears of War: Reloaded — Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass (Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC)

August 28

  • Dragon Age: The Veilguard — Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass (Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC)
- http://localhost:1313/posts/gamepass_august2025_wave2/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: PlayStation 5 price changes in the U.S.
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/playstation5_price_changes_in_the_us---copy---copy---copy/ -

Each bundle is increasing by $50

  • PlayStation 5 – $549.99
  • PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – $499.99
  • PlayStation 5 Pro – $749.99
